original_text: Oh! Jerusalem! Once you loved the Lord, as a wife loves her husband. But now you have become like a prostitute! At one time, the city was full of justice, and honest people lived there. But now the city is full of murderers!
korean_text: 신실하던 성읍이 어찌하여 창기가 되었는고 정의가 거기에 충만하였고 공의가 그 가운데에 거하였더니 이제는 살인자들뿐이로다

sentences.original_text: as a wife loves her husband
But now you have become like a prostitute!
At one time, the city was full of justice
sentences.korean_translation: 한 때 이 성은 정의가 가득했었다

sentences.original_text: But now the city is full of murderers!
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 이 성은 살인자들로 가득하다!
